## Sec256k1Provider class

Provider for Sec256p1 keys256p1

 Sec256p1Provider  implements IKeyProvider interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Sec256k1Provider implements IKeyProvider 
```
**Implements:** [IKeyProvider](./js-sdk.ikeyprovider.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
